name: Jerry's endless travels:Escape (ZX Spectrum) (prototype)
description:
This is second game of series "Jerry's endless travels".

Jerry saved his friend Erick from angry ghosts

Now they must find their Jerry's ship in dark mist created by Kagero. But they will find control device and 2 hidden treasures. This game still in developement and final version could be different than this prototype.

Made using multiplatform arcade game designer.

Controls:

q-up

a-down

o-left

p-right

2, 3 - shoot laser.
